Night shade's optics slowly flickered to life. Above her she could 
see a small stream of fading light. She reaches her hand that was 
free towards it, but it was out of reach. Every joint seared with 
pain. "Slag....I'm really in it now." She lowered her arm and watched 
the light fade. Her comm sent out another signal.
